scripts.start:dev: deno run --config ./deno.json --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write src/main.ts port=5050 tickrate=0.5 showDebug=true showPerfomance=true
scripts.build:linux: deno compile --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --config ./deno.json --import-map imports.json --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --output dist/server src/main.ts
